title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: (1) The system is accepting an invalid date/time string in the report design.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model to reject invalid input.
SR:
(3) To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report design interface.
2. Add a date/time field.
3. Enter an invalid date/time string.
4. Save the report design.
5. Check if the invalid date/time value is stored correctly.
